Text: thank you.  this is exactly what i was looking for.

Nice upload. Looking for 1 game...Star Trader. Doesn't appear to be in here?

I have it in my wardrobe in perfect working condition...on tape. Does anyone know how I go about setting it free online?

I imagine you'd have to hook up an old floppy disk drive to your computer.  Then using a c64 emulator you might be able to open the disk, and then save it as an image or .d64 file etc... Of course, that's just a guess.  The first part is more than likely right though.

Hey Pawny, here you go:

http://weasel.net/star-trader.zip

^_^
Just fixed the 404 on that Star Trader, it's back up again :)
Nice up griffie.  Also thanks to weasle!  I totally forgot about that one but was so excited to see it there.  Great Jr High memories.
good collection works well with VICE. :)
